description: This is a PHP source file used for the web-based configuration interface of a wireless network gateway. It contains PHP and embedded JavaScript and HTML to manage wireless network settings such as SSID, security mode, channels, and passwords.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Retrieves specific configuration parameters from the device management external interface and returns them as an associative array.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Collects form data and submits the wireless configuration changes via AJAX to the server for processing.

methods.name: setResetInfo
methods.description: Sends a reset/restore command via AJAX to restore default settings for the wireless configuration.
